mapper.select: SELECT guild_id, channel_id, created_at FROM live_subscription WHERE guild_id = #{guildId}
SELECT DISTINCT ON (channel_id) channel_id FROM live_subscription

SELECT DISTINCT ON (ls.guild_id) ls.guild_id, lac.channel_id FROM live_subscription ls JOIN live_alarm_channel lac ON ls.guild_id = lac.guild_id JOIN chzzk_live_status cls ON ls.channel_id = cls.channel_id WHERE ls.channel_id = #{channelId} ORDER BY ls.guild_id, lac.channel_id
